Name: Ampersand
About the game: Game Features: ★A variety of craft to choose from, with varying stats and abilities. ★Race on futuristic tracks with ultra realistic vehicles. ★Furiously fast paced racing with awesome vehicles designed with unprecedented precision. ★Unlock new tracks as you progress through the game. ★Collect different power-ups and use them to win. ★High resolution screen support.
